name: 肯尼斯·埃尔斯顿
name_full: 肯尼斯·埃尔斯顿 Kenneth Elston
introduction: Kenneth Robert Elston V is an American actor, film producer and screenwriter. In the Spring of 2014, upon acting in his first stage production "The Gilded Six-Bits" by Zora Neale Hurston; he without hesitation recognized and embraced acting as his first love. Throughout his life-long journey of manifesting his aspirations in all its entirety as it pertains to film, Kenneth Elston vowed to never succumb and devote a generous amount of effort into becoming an exceptional actor for there is nothing else he would rather do.
